epics.title: Enterprise Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement secure enterprise authentication with role-based access and tenant isolation
epics.description: Design and implement a secure authentication system integrated with enterprise identity providers using SAML, OAuth2.0, or LDAP protocols. Introduce role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure user permissions align with assigned roles within the organization. Enable multi-tenancy with tenant isolation to segregate data and access across departments or customers securely. Ensure user sessions are authenticated, audited, and adhere to enterprise-grade security standards.

epics.title: Cloud Account Onboarding and Provider Integration
epics.summary: Enable secure and flexible onboarding of cloud accounts across AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud
epics.description: Develop workflows that allow users to connect and verify accounts from multiple cloud environments. Integrate securely with AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud APIs using access tokens and permissions validated through provider authentication mechanisms. Implement secure storage and rotation of API credentials, ensure onboarding validation routines, and maintain multi-account management capabilities.

epics.title: Automated Resource Discovery and Normalization
epics.summary: Automatically discover, collect, and normalize resources across multi-cloud environments
epics.description: Create discovery routines that invoke provider APIs to continuously detect and ingest cloud assets, configurations, and metadata. Normalize data from disparate cloud schemas into a unified model to support consistent operations and visualizations. Implement batch and incremental discovery capabilities with retry, caching, and error-handling mechanisms to ensure resilient and accurate data synchronization.

epics.title: Unified Multi-Cloud Dashboard
epics.summary: Provide a personalized single-pane-of-glass dashboard for managing cloud inventory, cost, and posture
epics.description: Develop a customizable and responsive dashboard that presents an integrated view of multi-cloud status. Include metrics such as resource inventory, cost insights, security findings, and compliance summaries. Enable role-based personalization so each user views widgets and KPIs relevant to their responsibilities. Provide drill-down capabilities for deeper insights into individual accounts or cloud services.

epics.title: Cost Management and Optimization Analytics
epics.summary: Offer detailed cost visibility and actionable optimization recommendations across multi-cloud environments
epics.description: Integrate cost and usage APIs from all supported cloud providers to gather billing and usage data. Develop analytics to identify cost anomalies, trend patterns, and inefficiencies such as idle or over-provisioned resources. Provide dashboards and reports highlighting optimization opportunities with potential savings estimates. Enable cost forecasting, budget tracking, and expense attribution by project or business unit.

epics.title: Security and Compliance Management
epics.summary: Continuously assess cloud environments for security compliance and governance violations
epics.description: Implement a rules-based engine that evaluates cloud configurations against predefined standards (e.g., CIS, NIST, ISO 27001). Identify compliance gaps, misconfigurations, and vulnerabilities, providing actionable findings with explanations and remediation steps. Generate compliance reports and dashboards to track adherence over time. Enable integration with existing organizational security frameworks and risk management systems.

epics.title: Governance Automation and CI/CD Integrations
epics.summary: Execute automated governance and provisioning workflows integrated with CI/CD and IaC pipelines
epics.description: Develop governance workflows that trigger automated actions such as environment provisioning, resource cleanup, or policy enforcement. Integrate with CI/CD pipelines like Jenkins, GitLab, and Azure DevOps, and Infrastructure-as-Code tools like Terraform and Ansible. Define rule-based triggers and conditions for workflow initiation, with built-in approval steps and rollback procedures to ensure transparency and compliance.

epics.title: Alerts and Notifications Framework
epics.summary: Implement event-driven real-time alerts and notification channels for costs, risks, and compliance events
epics.description: Build a scalable event processing and alerting framework that generates real-time notifications for critical events such as cost spikes, policy breaches, or high-risk security vulnerabilities. Support configurable thresholds, severity levels, and routing preferences. Deliver alerts via email, chat integrations (Slack, Teams), or webhook endpoints for incident response workflows. Include deduplication and suppression rules to prevent alert fatigue.

epics.title: Comprehensive Audit Logging and Activity History
epics.summary: Implement full audit logging to track all user actions, configurations, and system events
epics.description: Create an immutable audit log capturing user actions, automated workflows, and system-level events across the platform. Include contextual metadata such as timestamps, actor identities, and impacted resources. Ensure logs are tamper-proof, searchable, and exportable to external SIEM systems for compliance and operational review. Implement configurable retention periods, archiving mechanisms, and access permissions for audit records.

epics.title: Performance, Scalability, and Reliability Engineering
epics.summary: Ensure platform scalability, high availability, and optimal performance under enterprise workloads
epics.description: Architect the system for scalability and performance under multi-tenant, high-load conditions. Implement asynchronous workflows, load balancing, and distributed data processing. Ensure redundancy through high-availability clusters, failover strategies, and real-time monitoring of key performance metrics. Integrate observability solutions to detect and resolve performance bottlenecks, guaranteeing continuous uptime and responsiveness.
